Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Meredith Sydnor (Syd) Graham Drawings
Graham, Meredith Sydnor, 1912?-1937
ALBA.GRAPHICS.004
0.25 Linear Feet (1 box)
Circa 1937
Scope and Contents
Collection contains three sketchbooks, disassembled sketchbooks, and individual sketches, with notes and life studies of soldiers, campesinos and rural life produced by Graham in Spain during the Civil War.
